Smoke Enforcer

4 HP, 1 Armor, Shock prod (d6), 3 cough-inducing smoke bombs

Summary:

• The semi-amphibian iron gauntlet of smokestick’s indentured workforce, they’re paid two pounds per beating, verified kills docks their pay for a week.

• Blind as bats, they seek your coughs in the smoke, water filled diving helmets ensure they don't need to switch from gills over to respiration.

• Here for the money only, and have no pride in their work. Employers and 'clients' alike make their lives miserable.
